model.config
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  model.config.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends Object

Configuration of a Tron game. This class specifies the size of the board, the position of walls on the board, the scale factor for drawing and the collection of start positions on the board.

Version:
1
Author:
Søren Dahlgaard, Daniel Hessellund Egeberg

Constructor Detail

Configuration

public Configuration(int width,
                     int height,
                     int scaleFactor,
                     Collection<LineSegment> lineSegments,
                     Collection<Position> startPositions)
Constructs a new configuration with the specified parameters.

Parameters:
width - The width of the board
height - The height of the board
scaleFactor - The scale factor to be used for drawing the board
lineSegments - A collection of walls on the board
startPositions - A collection of positions where players can start.
